languages.text: {n}Напряженно глядя на вас, Наместник тихо интересуется:{/n} "Может ли мой скромный дар загладить невольно нанесенное оскорбление?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Напряженно глядя на вас, наместник тихо интересуется:{/n} "Может ли мой скромный дар загладить невольно нанесенное оскорбление?"

languages.text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"
languages.original_text: {n}Напряженно глядя на вас, Наместник тихо интересуется:{/n} "Может ли мой скромный дар загладить невольно нанесенное оскорбление?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"
{n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"
{n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"
{n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"
{n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

languages.text: {n}男は緊張した表情を浮かべ、静かに言った。{/n}「ささやかな贈り物があれば、この不注意で生じてしまった無礼を見逃してもらえるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

traits.locale_text: {n}男は緊張した表情を浮かべ、静かに言った。{/n}「ささやかな贈り物があれば、この不注意で生じてしまった無礼を見逃してもらえるだろうか？」

languages.text: {n}他紧张地看了你一眼，随后平静地说道。{/n}“可以允许我送您一份谦卑的礼物，以此消除这无意为之的冒犯吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他紧张地看了你一眼，随后平静地说道。{/n}“可以允许我送您一份谦卑的礼物，以此消除这无意为之的冒犯吗？”

languages.text: {n}Te dedica una mirada tensa y dice en voz baja:{/n} «¿Arreglaría este descuido un humilde obsequio de mi parte?».
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Te dedica una mirada tensa y dice en voz baja:{/n} «¿Arreglaría este descuido un humilde obsequio de mi parte?».

languages.text: {n}Il vous lance un regard tendu, puis demande calmement :{/n} « Un modeste cadeau de ma part pourrait-il vous faire oublier cet affront involontaire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous lance un regard tendu, puis demande calmement :{/n} « Un modeste cadeau de ma part pourrait-il vous faire oublier cet affront involontaire ? »

languages.text: {n}Er blickt dich angespannt an und sagt dann ruhig:{/n} "Würde ein bescheidenes Geschenk von mir diesen unbeabsichtigten Affront wiedergutmachen?"
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er blickt dich angespannt an und sagt dann ruhig:{/n} "Würde ein bescheidenes Geschenk von mir diesen unbeabsichtigten Affront wiedergutmachen?"

languages.text: {n}Sana gergin bir bakış atıyor, sonra sessizce şöyle diyor:{/n} "Bendenizin vereceği mütevazı bir hediye, bu istemeden yapılan hakaretin özrü olarak kabul görür mü?"
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a tense look, then says quietly,{/n} "Could a humble gift from me smooth over this inadvertently caused affront?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana gergin bir bakış atıyor, sonra sessizce şöyle diyor:{/n} "Bendenizin vereceği mütevazı bir hediye, bu istemeden yapılan hakaretin özrü olabilir mi?"
